biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Christian Oliver (born March 3, 1972) is a German actor.

Oliver was born in Celle and grew up in Frankfurt am Main. He relocated to the US to work as a model and subsequently take acting lessons in New York and Los Angeles. In 2003 and 2004, Christian Oliver co-starred in 28 episodes of the German action TV series Alarm f√ºr Cobra 11.
